name: Thou shall party hard tonight
description:
-Made for the eJam 2020-

As the world's number one musician on tour, you often meet up with crazy fans in nightclubs. Your manager said to stay away from them. Nonsense ! They demand love so we shall give them enough groove to keep them from needing anymore love for the rest of their lives ! Liven this nightclub up from your beloved stage and show your fans what happiness truly means !
Share your music , your groove and your love from the stage to their heart's content ! But beware not to suffocate during your walkabout !

wasd or arrow keys to move around in the nightclub
right click to shower your fans with music
escape to start again and agaaaain ;D

Assets used :
   Dancing Donuts font made by Nick Curtis :
      https://www.1001fonts.com/dancingdonuts-font.html
   Sick Dance Bass made by StaticPony1 :
      https://freesound.org/people/staticpony1/sounds/251462/
Made with Godot 3.2
Music made with Bosca Ceoil (except for bass loop)
